ovdesc.p: This screen is used to define payment transaction types. This is another way to clasify payments.
ovdesc.P: The details will be stored in the store table, PPT.TRANSACTIONTYPES.

desc.p: Used for internal purpose. Value of this field determines values of the fields 'RAC' and 'RSC'.
This field can hold up to 1 alpha-numeric character and the value is not editable by the user.
Indicates the codification of the transaction type.
Example: CT - credit transfer, CI - credit transfer initiation, RT - return, RJ - reject, DD - direct debit.
Contains a description of the transaction type.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the current live record of store table.
This field can hold up to 65 alpha-numeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.
Used for internal purpose. Holds the ID of the previous live record of store table.
This field can hold up to 65 alpha-numeric characters and the value is not editable by the user.

Contains all the override messages which the user agreed to during Input. During the validation of a transaction, the system may provide the user with a series of screen override messages to indicate an anomaly.
Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
“H-YYYYMMDDHHMMSSsss” - History. Where: YYYY - year, MM - month, DD - day, HH - hour, MM - minutes, SS - seconds and sss - miliseconds
The value is not editable by the user.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
The value is not editable by the user.
